task_definition_name: Mifos-mobile app -- Likes and Dislikes about application.
description:
For the beginners' what you need to do is, clone/download Mifos mobile app and run it on android studio. 
After running it analyze the application and write 5 points about what you like about the app and the things you found unattractive. Likes and dislikes could be anything whether it may be colours, Layouts or alignments etc. 
You just need to type them on GoogleDocs or any other platform you like and share the link with me. After all this, ​I'll approve the task.
